Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class Minstrel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.Minstrel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Flow.Publisher<ModelUpdate>
public class Minstrel extends CharacterCard
Character card Minstrel. Effect: You may exchange up to 2 Students between your Entrance and your Dining Room.

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable()
      Description copied from class: CharacterCard
      Method that vary based on the actual card. It accesses the Game instance to understand using the current game state if it is proper to play the card.
      Specified by:
      isPlayable in class CharacterCard
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates the result

    • isValidAction

      public boolean isValidAction(ExpertGameAction action)
      Description copied from class: CharacterCard
      This is a critical method for the entire game. Based on the actual game state it decides whether the argument action should be allowed or not for the game flow. This method, combined with the decorator pattern, allows the played card to modify the usual game flow applying the card effect to the match.
      Specified by:
      isValidAction in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      action - game action to be verified
      Returns:
      the decision's result

    • applyAction

      public void applyAction() throws NoSuchElementException
      Swap the selected students between entrance and dining. The first color selected by the player must be the entrance student's color and the second one must be the dining student's color.
      Specified by:
      applyAction in class CharacterCard
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If there isn't a current player or the number of selected student is wrong or there isn't a student of the selected color in the dining.
